title: What is the best time of the day for outdoor exercising? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would argue early in the morning. The air is fresh. There isn’t much traffic. Most people are still asleep, and it’s pretty fulfilling to know that you are starting your day on a productive note. Of course, there’s the sunrise, morning birds and idyllic stillness that comes with the dawn. Now, you can argue that you may not be a morning person. I wasn’t one either. But that’s the power of outdoor exercise. It’s the real power to change. You can become a morning person. Exercise, after all, wakes you up better than anything.  I’ve run almost every morning, around 6am or earlier. It’s really the best time to experience the world, and get in the hard work before the day begins. Trust me, you feel so much better, so much more relieved from stress, if you start your day with exercise.
